My boyfriend and I stumbled upon this restaurant after the restaurant we intended to go was closed.  I am glad we went to this place instead as the food, service and atmosphere were great.  We ordered three tapas dishes (stuffed olives, meatballs with cuttlefish and blood sausages).  But star of the meal was fisherman paella which was amazing and reasonably price compare to other restaurants nearby.  Also the price of wine and sangria was pretty cheap (1.60 euro per cup)I would definitely recommend this place! Great food and great service!!
